title: HOW TO GROW YOUR OWN ORGANIC VEGETABLES AND HERBS AT HOME PART 1

tasks.task: Construct and fill a wooden box for starting seeds.
subtasks: Measure and cut three 6-foot redwood fence boards.
Cut a 2x4 cedar fence runner into desired lengths.
Create openings in two fence boards for the ends of the box.
Assemble the box structure with the cut boards.
Obtain seeds and organic soil suitable for gardening.
Sow seeds at a rate considering germination rates and potential losses.
Install a soaker hose or drip irrigation system for watering.
Protect young seedlings by suspending the hose off the soil surface.
Incorporate food waste into the soil to serve as natural fertilizer.
